mdRecord.dcterms:title: Doepner, Herman J. to H. P. Winderling; 18 of 23
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 19-24Doepner, Herman J. to H. P. Winderling, Principal regarding enrollment into International Criminologist School's courses/course #8 on fingerprints. Enclosed: envelope with 2 flyers full of testimonials, and several pamphlets--"Testimonial Letters" with said inside, "Information Concerning Our Courses of Study" with said inside, "International Criminologist School" with descriptions of program/school inside.; 7 leaves; DF 697
